001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.DurationSupport;
004import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
005import java.nio.file.Files;
006import java.nio.file.Path;
007import java.nio.file.StandardCopyOption;
008import java.time.Duration;
009import java.time.LocalDateTime;
010import java.time.ZoneOffset;
011import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
012import java.util.ArrayList;
013import java.util.Queue;
014import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue;
015
016/** A logbook collects notes, prints them, and is able to write itself into a file. */
017public class Logbook {
018
019  /** An abstract logbook entry. */
020  public sealed interface Note permits CaptionNote, MessageNote, ToolCallNote, ToolRunNote {}
021
022  /** A textual note starting a section of notes. */
023  public record CaptionNote(String line) implements Note {}
024
025  /** A weighted textual note. */
026  public record MessageNote(Level level, String text) implements Note {}
027
028  /** A note indicating that a tool is about to be called. */
029  public record ToolCallNote(ToolCall call) implements Note {}
030
031  /** A note indicating that a tool was run with a detailed description. */
032  public record ToolRunNote(ToolRun run, String description) implements Note {}
033
034  private final Bach bach;
035  private final Printer printer;
036  private final Queue<Note> notes;
037  private final LocalDateTime start;
038  private final String timestamp;
039
040  public Logbook(Bach bach) {
041    this.bach = bach;
042    this.printer = bach.printer();
043    this.notes = new ConcurrentLinkedQueue<>();
044    this.start = LocalDateTime.now(ZoneOffset.UTC);
045    this.timestamp = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(Configuration.TIMESTAMP_PATTERN).format(start);
046  }
047
048  public Duration uptime() {
049    return Duration.between(start, LocalDateTime.now(ZoneOffset.UTC));
050  }
051
052  private <N extends Note> N add(N note) {
053    notes.add(note);
054    return note;
055  }
056
057  public void logCaption(String line) {
058    print(add(new CaptionNote(line)));
059  }
060
061  public void logMessage(Level level, String text) {
062    print(add(new MessageNote(level, text)));
063  }
064
065  void logToolCall(ToolCall call) {
066    print(add(new ToolCallNote(call)));
067  }
068
069  void logToolRun(ToolRun run, String description) {
070    print(add(new ToolRunNote(run, description)));
071  }
072
073  protected void print(CaptionNote note) {
074    bach.out().println();
075    bach.out().println(note.line());
076  }
077
078  protected void print(MessageNote note) {
079    var severity = note.level().getSeverity();
080    var text = note.text();
081    if (severity >= Level.ERROR.getSeverity()) {
082      bach.err().println(text);
083      return;
084    }
085    if (severity >= Level.WARNING.getSeverity()) {
086      bach.out().println(text);
087      return;
088    }
089    if (severity >= Level.INFO.getSeverity() || bach.configuration().verbose()) {
090      bach.out().println(text);
091    }
092  }
093
094  protected void print(ToolCallNote note) {
095    var builder = new StringBuilder("%16s".formatted(note.call().name()));
096    for (var argument : note.call().arguments()) {
097      builder.append(" ").append(String.join("\\n", argument.lines().toList()));
098    }
099    var string = builder.toString();
100    var line = string.length() <= 111 ? string : string.substring(0, 111 - 3) + "...";
101    bach.out().println(line);
102  }
103
104  protected void print(ToolRunNote note) {
105    var run = note.run();
106    if (run.isError() || bach.configuration().verbose()) printer.print(run);
107  }
108
109  public void print(ToolRun run) {
110    if (run.isError() || bach.configuration().verbose()) return;
111    printer.print(run);
112  }
113
114  public String toMarkdown() {
115    var md = new ArrayList<String>();
116    md.add("# Bach Logbook");
117    md.add("");
118    md.add("- start: " + start);
119    md.add("");
120    md.add("## Notes");
121    md.add("");
122    for (var note : notes) {
123      if (note instanceof CaptionNote caption) {
124        md.add("");
125        md.add("**" + sanitize(caption.line()) + "**");
126        md.add("");
127        continue;
128      }
129      if (note instanceof MessageNote message) {
130        md.add("- [%s] %s".formatted(message.level().name(), sanitize(message.text())));
131        continue;
132      }
133      if (note instanceof ToolRunNote ran) {
134        var run = ran.run();
135        var thread = run.thread() == 1 ? "main" : "0x%x".formatted(run.thread());
136        var duration = DurationSupport.toHumanReadableString(run.duration());
137        md.add(
138            """
139
140            <details>
141            <summary>%s (%s):<code>%s</code></summary>
142            """
143                .formatted(duration, thread, run.name().strip()));
144        var command = run.name() + ' ' + String.join(" ", run.args());
145        md.add("> - `%s`".formatted(command.stripTrailing()));
146        md.add("> - executed by = " + ran.description());
147        md.add("> - executed in thread = " + run.thread());
148        md.add("> - exit code = " + run.code());
149        md.add("> - duration = " + duration);
150        if (!run.output().isEmpty()) {
151          md.add("> ");
152          md.add("> ```text");
153          run.output().lines().map(line -> "> " + sanitize(line)).forEach(md::add);
154          md.add("> ```");
155        }
156        if (!run.errors().isEmpty()) {
157          md.add("");
158          md.add("```text");
159          run.errors().lines().map(line -> "> " + sanitize(line)).forEach(md::add);
160          md.add("```");
161        }
162        md.add("""
163
164          </details>
165          """);
166        continue;
167      }
168      md.add("- `" + sanitize(note) + "`");
169    }
170    md.add(
171        """
172
173        ## Thanks for using Bach
174
175        Support its development at <https://github.com/sponsors/sormuras>
176        """);
177    return String.join("\n", md);
178  }
179
180  Path write(Path directory) throws Exception {
181    var logbookFile = directory.resolve(Configuration.LOGBOOK_MARKDOWN_FILE);
182    var archiveName = Configuration.LOGBOOK_ARCHIVE_FILE.replace("{TIMESTAMP}", timestamp);
183    var archiveFile = directory.resolve(archiveName);
184    Files.createDirectories(logbookFile.getParent());
185    Files.writeString(logbookFile, toMarkdown());
186    Files.createDirectories(archiveFile.getParent());
187    Files.copy(logbookFile, archiveFile, StandardCopyOption.COPY_ATTRIBUTES);
188    return logbookFile;
189  }
190
191  public static String sanitize(Object object) {
192    return object.toString().replace('\t', ' ').replaceAll("\\e\\[[\\d;]*[^\\d;]", "");
193  }
194}
